editField.deleteFieldDialogMessage1: Are you sure you want to delete field named:
editField.deleteFieldDialogMessage2: and all information related to it?

validation.fieldNameRequired: Field name must be filled in
validation.fieldNameLength: Field name can contain a maximum of 45 characters
validation.fieldAreaRequired: Field area must be filled in
validation.fieldAreaRange: Field area must be within the range of 0.00 to 999.99

cropDetails.noResults: No crops have been added yet
cropDetails.deleteDialogMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this crop?

addCropModal.requirements: To add a crop, select the type of crop and enter sowing date.
addCropModal.subHeader: Crop will be added to the currently selected field

validation.sowingDateRequired: Sowing date field must be filled in
validation.sowingDatePastOrPresent: Sowing date cannot be a future date

addHarvestModal.subHeader: Harvest will be added to the currently selected crop
addHarvestModal.requirements: To add a harvest, provide yield and enter harvest date.

validation.harvestDateRequired: Harvest date field must be filled in
validation.harvestDatePastOrPresent: Harvest date cannot be a future date
validation.harvestAfterSowing: Harvest date cannot be before sowing date
validation.yieldRequired: Yield field must be filled in
validation.yieldRange: Yield must be within the range of 0.000 to 999.999
